thread.title: 14 Tweets About "Beauty And The Beast" That'll Make You Cry-Laugh
thread.title_full: 14 Tweets About "Beauty And The Beast" That'll Make You Cry-Laugh

author: Keely Flaherty
title: 14 Tweets About "Beauty And The Beast" That'll Make You Cry-Laugh
text:
View this image › 
Twitter: @deancasIut ID: 10733382 8. Just saw Beauty and the Beast, all the basic 14-year-old girls in the theater screamed when Lumière dabbed.
— Jarrod Alonge (@JarrodAlonge) ID: 10733513 9. me arriving at dan stevens' house after watching beauty and the beast
— abby (@danstvns) ID: 10733541 10. gaston: *breathes* lefou:
— ㅤina (@spideythomas) ID: 10743628 11. The gayest moment is not LeFou but the fact that the Beast becomes human and is wearing capris #BeautyAndTheBeast
— Tim Stack (@EWTimStack) ID: 10733588 12. Beauty and the Beast has a gay character!? Disguting. Children need to know that love should only be between a woman and a horned wolf-bear.
— Chris R. Wright (@chrisrwright) ID: 10733263 13. My favourite part of the new 'Beauty and the Beast' is when Belle invents the washing machine, she's the MacGyver of the provincial life
— Cam Williams (@MrCamW) ID: 10743629 14. you: beauty and the beast me, an intellectual: GO GO GO POWER RANGERS
— lila (@gwencstacy) ID: 10733486 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com! 
  More News About Emma Watson
